author: Staff Reporter
text:
A march using traditional drums drew the attention of visitors to Marina Beach on Sunday evening.

Participants of a protest march organised by Thamizhaga Pengal Seyarkalam were playing the instruments, urging the Central government to remove the ban on ‘Jallikattu.’ The march was flagged off at Labour Statue and it ended near Light House.

The protesters said that bull-taming was a traditional sport of the Tamil community and hence the ban should be revoked.
title: March seeks removal of Jallikattu ban
